item.description:
This is part of the free movie series at the Windsor Public Library. The movie starts at 7pm.

From Here to Eternity:

In Hawaii in the months preceding the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, Pvt. Robert E. Lee Pruitt reports for his hew assignment as an infantryman. At his previous Post, Pruitt was a bugler and his unit's top boxer. After a man died in the ring however, Pruitt wants nothing to do with the sport. Trouble is, his new company commander, Captain Dana Holmes, has the championship boxing team and Pruitt's refusal to box results in most of the NCOs giving him a pretty hard time....

Starring: Burt Lancaster, Montgomery Clift, Deborah Kerr, Donna Reed, Frank Sinatra

The movie screen is in a room on the left as you walk into the library. Please feel free to bring your own refreshments.
item.name: From Here to Eternity (1953)
